mapper.select: select code from sys_user_role sur inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.role_id = sur.role_id inner join sys_menu sm on sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id where sur.user_id = #{userId}

select su.user_id as user_id,avatar, username, nick_name, sex, phone, email, sr.role_id as role_id, role_name, real_name from sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on su.user_id = sur.user_id left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id = sur.role_id where 1=1
and nick_name like "%"#{nickName}"%"
and real_name like "%"#{realName}"%"
order by su.update_time desc
